ISSUE.TITLE: add two new patches for Tengine case
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: https://github.com/apache/incubator-apisix/pull/834#discussion_r347181545 @totemofwolf We need those patches too. Enable privileged process feature: https://github.com/openresty/openresty/blob/master/patches/nginx-1.17.4-privileged_agent_process.patch Support to load local resolver conf: https://github.com/openresty/openresty/blob/master/patches/nginx-1.17.4-resolver_conf_parsing.patch
